In this episode we (Jiangfeng Xu and I, STEPS scholars) interviewed [Dr. Luke Gatiboni](https://cals.ncsu.edu/crop-and-soil-sciences/people/lcolpog/), professor at North Carolina State University. We learn about the P fertilization in Eastern NC and build up of legacy P. Highlighting the long-term fertilization experiments in Tidewater Research Station, NC.
